EmailTemplate.description: Sent when CS contract is received and signed
EmailTemplate.name: CS - BlueWave - Contract Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Community - Welcome!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Your Community Solar contract has been received and fully executed. You should receive a personal copy of the agreement from Docusign within the next two business days.
If you do not receive the fully executed contract in your email, or if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com.
You should receive an invitation to access your Member Portal shortly. In your Member Portal you will receive updates on your system's construction and be able to view its production levels once it is fully operating. You will also gain visibility into your savings and be able to communicate with other members of the BlueWave Community.
Please let us know if you ever have any questions.
Welcome to the BlueWave Solar Community!
Sincerely,
BlueWave Customer Care
